item.title: Wtf
item.dc:creator: @inferno inferno
item.description:
@inferno wrote:

Instead of your current key pressing stuff try this:

SendArrowSilentWait(a: Byte; WaitTime: Integer);
For a, 0 = up, 1 = right, 2 = down, 3 = left.

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

Check your "Until"s since if they aren’t found, it will repeat that procedure… which might be your problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

program New;

var
down,up:integer;

procedure first22;
begin
wait(100)
end;


procedure first21;
begin
writeln('left')
repeat
keydown(38) wait(10) keyup(38)
down:=down+1
until(down=100)
first22;
end;

procedure first2;
begin
writeln('down')
repeat
keydown(40) wait(10) keyup(40)
down:=down+1
until(down=100)
first21;
end;

procedure first13;
begin
repeat
keydown(39) wait(10) keyup(39)
until(getcolor(53,98)=61937);
first2;
end;


procedure shoot;
begin
keydown(getkeycode(' ')) wait(100) keyup(getkeycode(' '));
wait(10)
keydown(getkeycode(' ')) wait(100) keyup(getkeycode(' '));
wait(10)
keydown(getkeycode(' ')) wait(100) keyup(getkeycode(' '));
wait(10)
keydown(getkeycode(' ')) wait(100) keyup(getkeycode(' '));
wait(10)
keydown(getkeycode(' ')) wait(100) keyup(getkeycode(' '));
wait(10)
keydown(getkeycode(' ')) wait(100) keyup(getkeycode(' '));
wait(10)
first13;
end;

procedure first12;
begin
repeat
keydown(39) wait(10) keyup(39)
until(getcolor(65,92)=65535)
shoot;
end;


procedure first1;
begin
repeat
keydown(38) wait(10) keyup(38)
up:=up+1
until(up=100)
first12;
end;

begin
activateclient
clickmouse(113,468,true)
wait(100)
clickmouse(113,200,true)
wait(10)
first1
end.

okay when i starts it is supposed to go straight foreward. but instead it keeps doing circles, why???

this is an neverending boss battle script for neopets…

Read full topic
